properties.areaDesc: George, MS; Greene, MS; Jackson, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:56PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida...
Mississippi...

Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Choctaw...Clarke and
Washington Counties.
Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington
Counties.
Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Dallas...Monroe and Wilcox
Counties.
Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam - Tailwater affecting Clarke...Monroe and
Wilcox Counties.
Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County.
Leaf Near Mclain affecting George...Greene and Perry Counties.
Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting George...Greene and Wayne Counties.
Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George...Greene and Jackson Counties.

.Recent heavy rains have caused significant rises along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Pascagoula At Merrill
* From tomorrow morning until further notice.
* At 8PM Monday the stage was 21.7 feet.
* No flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by tomorrow morning and continue to rise
near 23.5 feet by early Friday morning.
* At 23.5 feet...Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill
flood.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
